description: A Short easy 1.5 km trail around Otter Pond on 95 % boardwalk.Some repairs needed and a large tree fallen over trail about halfway (June 2015).
directions: 1 kilometer North of Point Leamington, on Highway 350, Point Leamington, Newfoundland and Labrador A0H 1Z0, Canada
title: Otter Pond, Point Leamington
